articles.author: Veronika Melkozerova
articles.title: North Koreans are far from ‘cannon fodder,’ Ukrainian soldiers say - POLITICO Europe
articles.description: Zelenskyy offers prisoner exchange if Kim Jong Un helps with the return of Ukrainian prisoners from Russia.
articles.content:
Ukrainian soldiers describe the North Korean soldiers as being very far from inexperienced cannon fodder.  
They are young, motivated, physically fit, brave, and good at using small arms. They are a… [+1056 chars]
